Despite its brawn, it possesses a surprisingly delicate touch─and just as well it does. — In-game description

297.name: Ullr
297.acquired_by: Complete the achievement Dawnbright Hunter by defeating 2,000 A Rank Elite Marks and 1,000 S Rank Elite Marks in Dawntrail areas.
297.description: “ Belonging to Ratatoskr's brood, this dragon was searching for a mortal with whom it could weave songs when it chanced to see you in the middle of a hunt. So impressed was it by your prowess, it chose to accompany you on your travels in hopes of witnessing more heroic feats. — In-game description

298.name: Unicorn
298.acquired_by: Reward for leveling a Conjurer to level 30 and completing the Sidequest Unicorn Power.
298.description: “ Summon forth the single-horned steed you befriended in the Black Shroud. Not long ago, Eorzean unicorns numbered in the thousands, and could oft be seen roaming the Coerthas highlands in great majestic herds that would render the mountains white as snow. Poaching has caused the population to decline, and if it were not for your act of kindness, there would be one fewer. — In-game description

299.name: Uolon
299.description: “ Summon forth your uolon, a great big beast that tends the forest with a great big grin. This enormous beastkin native to the temperate forests of eastern Yok Tural is believed to be closely related to trolls and yetis. Possessed of exceptional intelligence, it has been observed accelerating plant growth by way of peculiar dances and aetheric emissions, a behavior that has earned it the attention of scholars. — In-game description

300.name: Vacuum Suit
300.acquired_by: Rare reward from Cosmic Fortune in Sinus Ardorum. Rare reward for completing a Mech Ops as a pilot in Sinus Ardorum.
300.description: “ Summon forth your vacuum suit, and live the dream of piloting a futuristic bipedal machina. Created for the Cosmic Exploration Initiative, this construction machina was developed as a collaboration between Loporrit, Sharlayan, and Garlean engineers. As a result, it exhibits magitek armor influences in its design, particularly in the area of its piloting system. — In-game description

301.name: Venturous Kamuy
301.acquired_by: Purchased from Khloe Aliapoh for 1 Khloe's Gold Certificate of Commendation Purchased from Faux Commander in Idyllshire (x5.7,y6.1) for 600 Faux Leaf
301.description: “ Summon forth your venturous kamuy, blessed wolf who shall not be bound by such corporeal laws as gravity or aerodynamics. During a journey to the Far East, the merchant Rowena came upon and took in this wolf which, having received a divine blessing, is able to lope freely through the sky. In the part of the world whence it hails, a practice exists wherein dogs are sent to pay homage at distant shrines in their masters' stead. — In-game description

302.name: Victor
302.acquired_by: Complete the achievement Endgame Hunter by defeating 2,000 A Rank Elite Marks and 1,000 S Rank Elite Marks in Endwalker areas.
302.description: “ Summon forth Victor, a dog to rule over all dogs─at dog shows, that is. Lauded by no less a personage than Emperor Varis, Victor is a perennial champion at Garlean dog shows. Being bred and trained for competition, it isn't suited to combat, though it may at least intimidate foes with its fearsome mien. — In-game description

303.name: Vinegaroon
303.acquired_by: Purchased from J'lakshai at Old Sharlayan (11.8, 13.2) or Wilmetta at Radz-at-Han (10.5, 7.4) for 3,200 Sack of Nuts
303.description: “ Summon forth your vinegaroon mount, a carnivorous scalekin with a jaw reminiscent of claws. While it is common for dragons to use vinegaroons as servants, men have struggled to domesticate the creatures. In recent years, however, the gleaners have developed a successful training method, allowing them to be employed as beasts of burden. — In-game description

304.name: Vurgar The Loyal
304.acquired_by: Purchased from Rarkorgor in Urqopacha for 18 Yok Huy Ward after achieving Rank 7 (Sworn) reputation with the Yok Huy society.
304.description: “ Summon forth Vurgar the Loyal, and give your enemies twenty seconds to comply. In ages past, the Yok Huy employed golems such as this as weapons of war, but following Tuliyollal's founding, they refrained from creating new ones out of their newfound aversion to conflict. In the Yok Huy tongue, the name Vurgar simply means “one who possesses a body of stone.” — In-game description

305.name: Wanyudo
305.description: “ Summon forth your wanyudo, and hold on for dear life as the nightmare rolls on. Appearing as an oxcart wheel adorned with a demonic face, this automaton originating from the Far East is created in the likeness of mythical apparitions that steal the souls of any who look upon them. While originally intended to repel intruders, it can also serve as a mode of transport for those with sufficient endurance. — In-game description

306.name: War Panther
306.acquired_by: Awarded from the Achievement But Somebody's Gotta Do It (Dark Knight) by completing 200 high-level full party duties as a Dark Knight.
306.description: “ Summon forth your war panther─a silent killer trained to maim anyone and everything...excepting you, of course. While more difficult to train than their cousins the coeurls, panthers bring their riders much more advantage on the field due to the beasts' inherent affinity to various magic. It is also believed that many dark knight battle techniques were conceived by watching panthers hunt. — In-game description

307.name: War Tiger
307.acquired_by: Awarded from the Achievement Tank You, Gunbreaker II by completing 200 dungeons (lv. 61 and above), extreme trials (lv. 61 and above), high-level duty roulette dungeons, or duty roulette leveling duties as a Gunbreaker.
307.description: “ Summon forth your war tiger to tear the enemy's morale to shreds with its cruel, curved fangs. Even among tigers, the sabertooth is said to be notoriously difficult to tame, but those creatures raised from birth may come to bear riders upon their backs and into war. — In-game description

308.name: Warbear
308.acquired_by: Awarded from the Achievement But Somebody's Gotta Do It (Warrior) by completing 200 high-level full party duties as a Warrior.
308.description: “ Summon forth your fearless warbear, veteran of a thousand battles, to fill your enemies with dread. In generations past, warriors seeking fame and glory would journey out into the untamed wilds of Abalathia's Spine in search of the giant grizzled bears that roamed the mountains, and would wrestle the beasts into submission, riding their prizes back to civilization. That is, or die trying. — In-game description

309.name: Warlion
309.acquired_by: Awarded from the Achievement But Somebody's Gotta Do It (Paladin) by completing 200 high-level full party duties as a Paladin.
309.description: “ Summon forth your fearless warlion to rule over the battlefield, such is his station as king of the beasts. Early in the Sixth Astral Era, lions were brought over from the Near East and trained to serve as battle mounts for the Sultansworn of Ul'dah. Deemed unbreakable, those not sold to the Coliseum for venationes were released into the deserts of Thanalan where they eventually reverted back to a feral state. — In-game description

310.name: Warp Loader
310.acquired_by: Rare reward from Cosmic Fortune in Phaenna. Rare reward for completing a Mech Ops as a pilot in Phaenna.
310.description: “ Call into action your warp loader, and bulldoze your way through life. Created for the Cosmic Exploration Initiative, this six-wheeled construction machina can traverse the roughest terrain with ease, and boasts ample power for clearing away obstacles with its front-facing blade. It is highly regarded among the Loporrits for its combination of utility and mobility. — In-game description

311.name: Warring Lanner
311.acquired_by: Random drop upon completion of Containment Bay S1T7 (Extreme). Purchased from Bertana for 99 Fiend Totems.
311.description: “ Summon forth the warring lanner. Favored of the primal Sephirot, it carries the seeds of the World Tree. These birds are enveloped in an aura radiating a majesty that belies the savage nature of their master. According to the ancient legends of a treelike people native to Meracydia, the lanners bore the seeds of the World Tree across the seas, planting the verdant forests that dot the realm today. — In-game description

312.name: Whisper A-go-go
312.acquired_by: Awarded from the Achievement More Inventory Slots, Please I by obtaining 13 out of the available 17 Yo-kai Weapons during the Collaboration Event Yo-kai Watch: Gather One, Gather All!.
312.description: “ Summon forth the Whisper A-go-go. A flashy upgrade to a small flying vessel designed in the likeness of a Yo-kai named Whisper. Moved by your unyielding dedication and patronage, the wandering executive once again commissioned the architects of the Gold Saucer, this time to upgrade the Whisper-go as a gift from himself and his friend, the wandering minstrel. — In-game description

313.name: Whisper-go
313.acquired_by: Awarded from the Achievement You Must Needs Befriend Them All I by obtaining 13 out of the available 17 Yo-kai Minions during the Collaboration Event Yo-kai Watch: Gather One, Gather All!.
313.description: “ Summon forth the Whisper-go. A small, flying vessel designed in the likeness of a Yo-kai named Whisper. Taken in by the vibrant sights of the Gold Saucer, the wandering executive sought out the plaza's architect to design him a vessel of transportation similar in flamboyance to its myriad attractions. The seats are so finely upholstered riders swear it is as if they are floating on air. — In-game description

314.name: White Devil
314.description: “ Call into battle the White Devil─Livia sas Junius's custom-made battle armor, now your custom-made battle armor. This masterpiece of imperial ingenuity is the selfsame suit of warmachina operated by XIVth Legion tribunus Livia sas Junius in the Garlean Empire's subjugation of Othard's southern reaches. — In-game description

315.name: White Lanner
315.acquired_by: Random drop upon completion of The Limitless Blue (Extreme). Purchased from Bertana for 99 Expanse Totems.
315.description: “ Summon forth the white lanner. Favored of the primal Bismarck, he soars the skies unchallenged. These birds are clad in roiling clouds, and noble Vanu Vanu warriors would sit astride them as part of Bismarck's retinue. The grace with which they glide through the skies evokes the image of a flower petal being carried by gentle western winds. — In-game description

316.name: Wings of Death
316.acquired_by: Random drop upon completion of The Minstrel's Ballad: Necron's Embrace
316.description: “ Manifest your wings of death. Their somber hue exudes a sense of impending doom. Found within the Meso Terminal, these somber wings are reminiscent of Necron, the dark primal brought forth by the fear of death that had gripped Alexandrians. While their origin is shrouded in mystery, only one who stands unyielding beneath the weight of impending doom can hope to bear them. — In-game description

317.name: Wings of Eternity
317.acquired_by: Random drop upon completion of The Minstrel's Ballad: Sphene's Burden. Purchased from Uah'shepya for 99 Totem Eternal.
317.description: “ Manifest your wings of eternity and soar the skies with an aura of unwavering determination. Found within the virtual domain created by the Meso Terminal, these armor-clad wings are reminiscent of the dread entity that Sphene had become. While their origin is shrouded in mystery, they exude the unwavering determination of a ruler who placed her subjects above all else. — In-game description

318.name: Wings of Mist
318.acquired_by: Random drop upon completion of Hell on Rails (Extreme)
318.description: “ Manifest your wings of mist. Their eldritch aura exudes an unstoppable resolve. Found along the railroad tracks near Treno, these eldritch wings are reminiscent of the Doomtrain, the monstrous locomotive that had sped nonstop across the Mist Continent for long years. While their origin is shrouded in mystery, they exude the steely resolve of one who walks levin-ravaged wastes. — In-game description

319.name: Wings of Resolve
319.acquired_by: Random drop upon completion of Everkeep (Extreme). Purchased from Uah'shepya for 99 Resilient Totems
319.description: “ Calling to mind Zoraal Ja, King of Resolve of Alexandria, these magicked wings grant their wearer an aura of undying pride. Though they were discovered near the throne on the summit of Everkeep, the truth of their nature is shrouded in mystery. — In-game description

320.name: Wings of Ruin
320.acquired_by: Random drop upon completion of Worqor Lar Dor (Extreme). Purchased from Uah'shepya for 99 Skyruin Totems
320.description: “ Calling to mind Valigarmanda, the dread creature dubbed the Skyruin, these magicked wings grant their wearer an aura of irrepressible might. Though they are said to manifest only for those who are worthy, the truth of their nature is shrouded in mystery. — In-game description

321.name: Wings of the Knighthood
321.acquired_by: Random drop upon completion of Recollection (Extreme) Purchased from Uah'shepya for 99 Knight Totems
321.description: “ Manifest your wings of the knighthood. Their vibrant red hue exudes the passion of a dutiful knight. Found within the ruins of Alexandria Castle, these armor-clad wings are reminiscent of the formidable machine imbued with the memories of Zelenia, former second-in-command of the royal knights of Alexandria. While their origin is shrouded in mystery, they exude the passion of a knight who lived to serve her queen. — In-game description

322.name: Witch's Broom
322.acquired_by: Reward for completing the Seasonal Event Quest Sweeping the Meadows during All Saints' Wake (2015). Final Fantasy XIV Online Store - ($12 / £7.44 / €9 / ¥1320)
322.description: “ Summon forth your witch's broom. Here is to hoping it refrains from “flipping you over, flip flip” while flying. Once an ordinary household cleaning tool, relegated to such menial tasks as sweeping and...sweeping, this broom's life changed upon being enchanted by the ogre pumpkinhead. Now the skies are its dusty floors. — In-game description

323.name: Wivre
323.acquired_by: Purchased from Edelina in Mor Dhona (x22,y5) for 500 Bicolor Gemstone Voucher (effectively 50,000 Bicolor Gemstones)
323.description: “ Summon forth your wivre, a mighty horned beast said to be nature's battering ram. Native to the New World, these ill-mannered scalekin are notoriously difficult to tame. Yet where others have failed, the Mamool Ja have succeeded, their people employing wivres as beasts of burden and weapons of war both. — In-game description

324.name: Wondrous Lanner
324.acquired_by: Purchased from Khloe Aliapoh for 1 Khloe's Gold Certificate of Commendation Purchased from Faux Commander in Idyllshire (x5.7,y6.1) for 600 Faux Leaf
324.description: “ Summon forth your wondrous lanner, a proud bird with a fondness for fantastical tales. Under the patronage of its mistress Rowena, this enchanted falcon has led a pampered life. Able to comprehend language, it loved nothing more than to listen to Khloe Aliapoh's tales, whose heroic protagonist it aspired to bear upon its back─in contest with another of Rowena's pets. — In-game description

325.name: Wyvern
325.acquired_by: Purchased from Bertana in Idyllshire for 6 Clan Mark Logs (effectively 3,000 Centurio Seals).
325.description: “ Summon forth your wyvern, master of the skies and forever-loyal servant. Fifty score years ago, this wyvern made a pact with a knight to aid in vanquishing evil from the skies. Even now, long after the knight's passing, the wyvern has kept that promise, ever circling the heavens─ignoring the calls of his brethren to take up arms against mankind. — In-game description

326.name: Xanthos
326.acquired_by: Random drop upon completion of The Howling Eye (Extreme).
326.description: “ Summon forth Xanthos, the legendary steed favored of the primal Garuda. At full gallop, it is said to be the very wind itself. Legend states that the Lady of the Vortex, Garuda, created this magicked steed from a nightmare offered by the Ixal in sacrifice. — In-game description

327.name: Yan
327.description: “ Summon forth your yan, a sheep spirit whose disarmingly adorable appearance belies its tremendous might. Hailing from the Ninth, this unusually proportioned sheep is held to be a benevolent spirit that bestows blessings in exchange for an offering of diamonds. This entity in particular is especially genial and generous, and gladly employs its powers in service to your transportation. — In-game description

328.name: Yol
328.acquired_by: Reward for completing the Main Scenario Quest In the Footsteps of Bardam the Brave.
328.description: “ Summon forth your yol, proof of your recognition by the Azim Steppe Xaela as a true warrior. High atop the granite peaks of Othard's Fanged Crescent do the yol claim their demesne, descending to the Azim Steppe to prey upon warriors who pretend not to fear the monsters of their ancestor's tales. Rare indeed is it that a yol might cede its back to man, though to those who have proved their mettle, the creatures have been known to make exception. — In-game description

329.name: Zu
329.acquired_by: Purchased from any Resident Caretaker for 1 Iron Voyage Spoil from Free Company airship ventures: Sea of Clouds - Sector 24. Drops from Materiel Container 3.0.
329.description: “ Summon forth your zu. Its weighty wings have carried it from the Near East. This massive bird hunts by grasping its prey within its saw-like beak, and finishes it off with a few violent shakes of its long neck before swallowing the now-dead quarry whole. — In-game description
